meanings.definition: The act of fishing with a spear.
meanings.sent1: Spearfishing requires good aim and patience.
meanings.sent2: My grandfather taught me how to go spearfishing in the river.
meanings.sent3: During the spearfishing competition, the fish seemed to be playing hide and seek.
meanings.sent4: In the clear water, spearfishing felt like trying to catch a moving shadow.
meanings.sent5: The simplicity of spearfishing makes it a peaceful way to catch fish.

meanings.definition: The sport or practice of hunting fish underwater using a spear.
meanings.sent1: Spearfishing in the ocean can be an exciting adventure.
meanings.sent2: Many people enjoy the challenge of spearfishing for their dinner.
meanings.sent3: The mermaid princess excelled in spearfishing, impressing all the sea creatures.
meanings.sent4: His determination in spearfishing was like a warrior on a quest for his prize.
meanings.sent5: The thrill of spearfishing is unmatched by any other fishing method.
